troves_chased_content_not_available: No available star content! Check back in later~

troves_hub_banner_empty_footer:
River Sprites are busy working on new Star Content to offer!
Please come back soon.
troves_hub_banner_error_footer: Please check your connection or contact support.riotgames.com
troves_mythic_token_dialog_content:
Using a Promise Token will guarantee that you receive star content from this Bounty.
Would you like to continue?
troves_pull_button_confirmation_modal_co: Using {{cost}} Treasure Tokens will open {{rollCount}} Bounty that contains content or currency. Would you like to continue?

troves_pull_button_confirmation_stop_sho: Do not show again for this session.
troves_pull_error_dialog_content_msg: You drop in a token, expecting a magical (and totally scientific) transformation... but instead, your token pops back out.
troves_pull_error_dialog_support_msg: Please try again later or contact support.riotgames.com
troves_redeem_dialog_content:
Use {{currencyWithQuantity}} to redeem {{name}}.
Would you like to continue?
troves_redeem_insufficient_dialog_conten: Please collect {{currencyName}} from Treasure Realms, Missions or Battle Pass.
troves_tokens_description:
Used to open Bounties that contain Star Content, tacticians, arenas, and more!

{{amount}} Treasure Tokens

troves_store_order_error_code_1008: This purchase will exceed the daily limit for Treasure Tokens. You can purchase at most {{availableQuantity}} additional Treasure Tokens. The daily limit will reset in the next 24 hours.
troves_loot_odds_bad_luck_protection_des: For this Bounty, opening a certain number of items without getting the Star Content will guarantee you getting the Star Content on the next open. This will rollover to other Bounties with Realm's Promise.
troves_loot_odds_dual_bounty_description: The Dual Bounty includes 2 pieces of Star Content. On your first Star Category drop, you have a 50% chance of receiving either piece. On the second Star Category drop, you are guaranteed to receive the remaining piece. If you already own both pieces, you will receive the fallback reward.
troves_loot_odds_duplicates_description:
If you pull a content that you already own, you will receive a flat amount of currency instead. This amount will be different based on the rarity of the content:
Prestige: 25 Mythic Medallions
Mythic: 10 Mythic Medallions
Legendary: 500 Realm Crystals
Standard: 200 Realm Crystals
troves_loot_odds_duplicates_description_:
If you pull a content that you already own, you will receive a flat amount of currency instead. This amount will be different based on the rarity of the content:
Prestige Chibi: 25 Mythic Medallions
Star Arena: 10 Mythic Medallions
Star Chibi: 7 Mythic Medallions
Legendary: 500 Realm Crystals
Standard: 200 Realm Crystals
troves_loot_odds_mythic_promise_descript: If you hit 50 pulls without having received random drops of Mythic Medallions from the bounty, you will get a guaranteed drop of 1 Mythic Medallion on your next pull.
collectors_loot_odds_bad_luck_protection: Prestige content for this bounty is guaranteed within 30 attempts. This bounty does not interact with Realmâ€™s Promise, and attempts on this bounty do not rollover to other bounties.
collectors_loot_odds_droprates_modal_leg: For this bounty, Prestige Content is guaranteed within 30 attempts. This bounty has a limit of 30 attempts. After 30 attempts, the bounty will be become unavailable.
